vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Μαλελεήλ (T, Μελ-), ὁ (Heb. מַהֲלַלְאֵל),
Mahalaleel: Luk.3:37.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.5.12;
son of: Kenan (H7018);
father of: Jared (H3382); also called Mahalaleel (NIV: Mahalel) at Luk.3.37;
§ Mahalalel, "praise of God [El]"
Maleleel, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:37*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪勒列 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "讚美神"
該南的兒子, 亞當的第四代子孫 (路 3:27)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛勒列 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "赞美神"
该南的儿子, 亚当的第四代子孙 (路 3:27)
